Container.Name: ai-chat-app
Container.Overview: ai-chat-app - Open Source, Self-Hosted Chat GPT app
Container.Changes:
### 2023-03-28 - Add variable checks
### 2023-03-21 - Add service checks
### 2023-03-19 - Add mutli-user variables.
### 2023-03-05 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: NEXTAUTH_SECRET
Config.Description: Used to encrypt the NextAuth.js JWT and to hash email verification tokens, set to something long and random.

Config.Name: NEXTAUTH_URL
Config.Description: Set this to the IP:port used to access the container.

Config.Name: ADMIN_EMAIL
Config.Description: Email used to access the WebUI.

Config.Name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password used to access the WebUI.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: UMASK for newly created files. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
